Contact info goes here

Right now, deep-rooted challenges inhibit Kenyan journalists from holding their government accountable. This research report details these challenges, and was created for both investors and media actors. Our goal is to inspire new funding streams, which are necessary for innovative, rigorous media outlets to gain a foothold—and to establish a truly independent media sector in Kenya.

This report is a product of the Reboot Media program, which strengthens government watchdogs worldwide.
